edict: Pursue your own goals, bring things to their proper ending, split things in half or otherwise create pairs
markdown:
<title level="1" right="Deity " pfs="Standard">[Imbrex (The Twins)](/Deities.aspx?ID=454)</title>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<traits>

</traits>

**Source** [Divine Mysteries](/Sources.aspx?ID=234) pg. 306

Known as the Twins, Imbrex is the mysterious Eldest of twins, statues, and endings. Appearing as two immense stone statues hundreds of feet tall holding hands and looking outward, Imbrex neither moves nor speaks. The Eldest sometimes communicates with telepathic utterances that rend minds or deliver psychic enlightenment, but they more often express their will through startlingly realistic dreams that sometimes manifest into strange life. An entire city named Anophaeus sprawls at Imbrex’s four feet, populated by jaded urbanites, eager aspirants, and prowling dreamcreatures made real. An unusually high proportion of those born in Anophaeus are twins, and twins are also common among Imbrex’s worshippers. Although Imbrex appears timeless in form, they are intrigued by dramatic endings, particularly apocalypses, and have foreknowledge of disasters to come.

<column gap="tiny">

**Category** [Eldest
](/DeityCategories.aspx?ID=7)

**Edicts** Pursue your own goals, bring things to their proper ending, split things in half or otherwise create pairs

**Anathema** Offend Imbrex

**Area of Concern**
Endings, statues, twins

</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
<title level="2">Devotee Benefits</title>

<column gap="tiny">

**[Divine Attribute](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=132)**
Constitution or Wisdom

**Divine Font** [Harm](/Spells.aspx?ID=146) or [Heal](/Spells.aspx?ID=148)

**Divine Sanctification** none

**Divine Skill** [Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=44)

**Favored Weapon** [War Flail](/Weapons.aspx?ID=402)

**Domains** [Dreams](/Domains.aspx?ID=72), [Earth](/Domains.aspx?ID=73), [Family](/Domains.aspx?ID=74), [Might](/Domains.aspx?ID=83)

**[Alternate Domains](/Rules.aspx?ID=802)** [Vigil](/Domains.aspx?ID=123)

**Cleric Spells**

- **1st**
[Mindlink](/Spells.aspx?ID=1603)

- **4th**
[Mountain Resilience](/Spells.aspx?ID=1610)

- **7th**
[Duplicate Foe](/Spells.aspx?ID=1505)

</column>
name: Imbrex (The Twins)
